reviews.review: Took me forever to finally play this because I was pretty meh about the first two. It's better than those, but it does have some of the same problems those games had. The world is way more interesting than the actual game. Gameplay often feels tedious, like everything you do is just wasting your time and deliberately dragging out a story that should be moving faster. Enemies keep teleporting/appearing/dropping directly behind you. The narrative is heavily reliant on trying to make you feel remorse for decisions you "made", which either happened before the game began, or where you were forced to make because the story is entirely linear, so the impact isn't really there, like showing up to the first day of a job and having people try to blame you for stuff that happened months ago. My main takeaway is the same as from Bioshock 1 and 2. The writers aren't as deep as they think they are, and this would make a way more interesting mockumentary than it does a game.

2021.3.23  作为一款8年前的FPS游戏，精美的景色和绝佳的打击感放在今天依然十分能打，各种独特的设定使游戏性也毫不逊色，BGM同为上佳。伊丽莎白的人物塑造堪称完美，可以说能让我两天一口气连续玩了十几个小时通关的最大原因就是有她的陪伴。

       剧情震撼得全身鸡皮疙瘩，真的很难想象这些画面这些对白这些切镜在一个游戏而不是电影里出现，浑然天成、流畅丝滑、跌宕起伏、寓意深刻、感人肺腑。也因为游戏，让这样的剧本能这么有代入感地呈现在玩家眼前。脑子嗡嗡地响，沉浸至深通关后仍久久不能出来。这可是13年的游戏！！！！

       这就是第九艺术吧，游戏也分好坏，就像电影等其他八大艺术一样。好的游戏发人深省，叫人思考，就像好的电影空前绝后，振聋发聩一般，都是隐含美学的表达，都是艺术。

QUE JOGO MARAVILHOSO! Se você gosta de FPS: jogue! se você gosta de jogos lindos: jogue! Se você gosta de gameplay variada e com diversas opções de abordagens: jogue! se você gosta de história: JOGUE MUITO! Diferentemente dos outros Bioshocks em infinite temos luz na maior parte da campanha, cores e inimigos menos medonhos, mas a história, é simplesmente a melhor que já vi em um jogo, com plot Twists a cada minuto do último capítulo, e um final lindo e emocionante como qualquer obra literária boa deve ser. SPOILER ALERT: se você gosta de sci-fi, viagem no tempo e paradoxos de bootstrep, JOGUE BIOSHOCK INFINITE!
实打实的一件艺术品
整个游戏充满了对战争的反思，多元宇宙的视觉效果超棒，直到今天玩仍然觉得很震撼，就是结局好让人伤心。游戏的剧情解谜部分很好，但战斗关卡设计过多了一点，打到后期觉得重复度比较高。

Bioshock Infinite is a masterpiece of  a game, after playing through the whole series, this game is the best one out of the three in my opinion.

The story, the combat, and gameplay are just hard to beat, and are so much more enjoyable than it is in the other 2 Bioshock games.

If you can I recommend you buy this game for you wont regret it.

Direk BioShock serisine bu oyun ile başladım (Diğerleri var fakat tam içine çekemediler baktım oynamıyorum silip direk son oyunu indirdim) fazla spoiler vermeden anlatacak olursam oynayış bildiğiniz silahla adam vurma 2 tane silah taşıya biliyorsunuz aynı anda. Skill kısmı cidden fazla ve her skilin 2 farklı kullanım şekli var ama fazla olması kötü bence oynadıysanız ya da oynamadan bu yorumu okuyorsanız oynayınca dediğimi anlayacaksınız oyun boyunca 2 skill kullandım çok güçlü makina ve robotlara 1. skill normal adamlarla savaşırken de karga skili diğerleri hiç ilgimi çekmedi. Diğer oyunlarda farklı olarak gökyüzünde oynuyoruz. Eğer alsam mı ? Almasam mı ? Diye düşünüyorsanız şu anda, diğerlerini bilmem ama en azından bu oyunu alın. Ortalama kaç saat sürdüğünü malesef söyleyemem çünkü çok oyalanarak oynuyorum ben oyunu, full resim çekmek ile uğraştım :D

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2430939230
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2425070727

Resimler biraz oyunun orta ve son safalarına yakın spoiler yemezsiniz ama gene de siz bilirsiniz.


Elizabeth'e aşık olmamanız imkansız bu oyunu bitiren herkesin oyun süresi boyunca aşık olduğu kişi kesinlikle Elizabeth dir. Karakter tasarımı olarak Elizabeth cidden çok iyi sizin haraketlerinize göre haraket eder, savaşta yarım eder, savaşırken direk saklanır, etrafta birisini görürse gidip konuşur, AFK olarak duruyorsanız etrafta bank varsa gidip ona oturur, insanları izler ya da belli başla olaylarda sizi bırakıp olayı izler uzun uzun. Kısaca güzel tasarlamışlar hoş duruyor ve son olarak hikayeye gelecek olursak hikayesi cidden çok iyiydi her şey oyun bitirince ortaya çıkıyor bu yüzden şiddetle oyunu oynayıp bitirmenizi ya da en azından hikayesini araştırıp okumanızı tavsiye ederim. Hikayesi 9/10 bana göre ve çok sevdiğim bir filme de benziyor hikaye olarak.
epico juegazo

This game saved my life.

I am 42.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

This game is legitimately programming. You start the game and are greeted by a cult that seems like what a lefty would view as Christianity. Even pseudo-depictions of Mary, Joseph and Jesus. Okay, maybe it's just a thing. You get further, American flags everywhere, founding fathers. Sweet. Progress further, evil white conservatives preparing to murder an interracial couple. Um...okay. Then a little more, flashes of American flags everywhere, then soldiers that look a hell of a lot like Nazis jumping around. You enter a house, black people hiding inside and the police banging on the door saying "OPEN UP". A poster on the wall saying "Until the negro is equal nobody is equal" (Sounds similar to "until black lives matter no lives matter" eh?). Walk down the hall, more presidential figures everywhere, barrages of Nazis, and literally ships with American flags flying all over the place in the background. This is honestly shocking how blatant the conditioning is. Every single element of this game is just waving lefty propaganda in your face. Totally counter-culture bro, AAA titles from billionaire corporations shilling your ideology.

Или я чего то не понимаю, или все положительные комментарии за последние несколько лет - сплошной сознательный  п%$#&ёшь. Что может впечатлить в этой игре, когда на дворе 21 год? 
Не ведитесь на эти розовые сопли про "волшебный воздушный город" и про "назвать свою дочь Элизабет", игра вас не впечатлит, когда то она была шедевром - очень возможно, но это было почти 10 лет назад. На сегодняшний день игра играется очень уныло. 
Вы начитаетесь этих "странных" отзывов, купите эту игру, 2-3 часа будите играть в ожидании, что вот-вот, ещё пару перестрелок и будет интересно... А когда осознаете, что интересно не будет и не может быть и захотите вернуть деньги - поддержка стима вам ответит, что вы играли 2 часа 45 минут, а мы не возвращаем деньги тем кто играл более 2 часов.

Recomiendo bastante este juego, su jugabilidad e historia son bastante buenos y tiene muy buenos gráficos. 
Lo que mas resalta en si seria la historia, es una bastante profunda y su argumento principal se basa en una teoría de la mecánica cuántica que postula la posibilidad de la existencia de múltiples o infinitos universos paralelos pero con algunas variantes, la teoría de "El gato de Schrödinger" explica bastante bien esta paradoja que observamos durante el juego.

Este juego es un 10. Para empezar está la jugabilidad, que si bien no deja de ser un shooter, tiene los vigorizadores, que te permiten experimentar un montón y afrontar a los enemigos de diferentes formas. Además, pueden ser mejorados, al igual que las armas, y las sales, que son lo que los vigorizadores consumen. También hay ciertos objetos que te dan ventajas al hacer ciertas cosas. En eso el juego es muy divertido y cumple con creces.
En cuanto a la historia, no se queda atrás, dejándome con la boca abierta con cada giro de trama, especialmente su final. Con la piel de gallina. Tanto es así que seguro que vas a necesitar pasarte el juego al menos una segunda vez para entender todo y al hacerlo te darás cuenta de que te lo estaban dejando caer desde un principio, y no te diste ni cuenta. 
Los personajes son también un punto fuerte de este juego, siendo Elizabeth, nuestra compañera y protagonista junto a Booker, la que mas destaca. Durante el juego, ella puede encontrar munición, sales, botiquines, dinero, y puede traer aliados y construcciones, como ganchos en el techo con los que acceder a terreno elevado, coberturas, cajas de munición y salud al querer. Y para mi sorpresa la primera vez que jugué, no hace falta protegerla durante el combate, porque se queda a un lado y los enemigos no la atacan. Además es un encanto, y el elemento más importante de la historia.
La música es sencillamente hermosa y se ajusta de maravilla a la situación. Aquí no hay mucho que decir, simplemente escúchala y verás a qué me refiero.
Los gráficos son muy buenos, y aunque es cierto que si vas al detalle y miras de cerca los objetos, puedes ver que no están muy bien detallados, este juego consigue que funcionen en conjunto y sea impresionante. No es tanto lo gráfico sinó los recursos que usa los que hacen que se vea tan hermoso. Es una maravilla visual, por mucho que no tenga gráficos de ultima generación y esas mi*rdas. 
En cuanto a la dificultad, recomiendo empezarlo en difícil, porque la facil no la he probado pero la normal sí y si juegas a otros shooters de forma habitual, no va a tener mucha complicación. Y después está el modo 1999, que es ya otra cosa. Sigue sin ser demencial, porque me lo pasé al día siguiente de terminar en dificil, pero es un reto que recomiendo mucho. Se hubiera agradecido un modo +, que te permitiera iniciar una partida nueva con el dinero y mejoras de la última, pero eso hubiese hecho el juego demasiado fácil.
La duración del juego no decepciona. Es lo suficientemente larga para que valga la pena los 30€ que te has gastado en esta perlita. Antes he dicho que me pasé el juego en su máxima dificultad, al dia siguiente de terminarlo en difícil pero eso no significa mucho, porque era la tercera vez en una semana, y no jugaba a otra cosa desde que empecé(y así sigo), además ya sabía donde tenía que ir y intenté pasarmelo en el mínimo tiempo posible. La primera vez que juegues seguro que tardas mas de 10 horas, si no intentas recoger todos los coleccionables, claro.

Este juego no creo que te decepcione. A mí me ha encantado, es más, ahora es mi juego favorito de entre todos los que he jugado en mi vida. Quizás tu juegues y no lo veas igual, pero no se puede decir que no es un juegazo. Recomendado al 100%.

You kill sky racists. 10/10

Graphics and visuals still hold up well in 2021, the gun play and movement may feel clunky sometimes, but its still fun especially when you use the powers. The difficulty of the game can sometimes be inconsistent, you will find you can beat a good chunk of the game without any troubles, but have a few encounters where it really ramps up.

The story is a total mindfuck where i'm still trying to make sense of it, but I feel like it was well worth it to put in the time to get to the ending. The game doesn't make much sense when you're going through it, you might wonder how everything works, but there's a lot of contextual clues and hidden lore in audio tapes to piece some things together. The ending will make sense of the game, but at the same time may not, I personally looked up some ending analysis to make sense of it (not a fault of the game.. just a mindfuck of a story and my smooth brain).
